original_title: CIC Trump puts TEETH into the law >>>  Trump Administration REVOKES Business License of Employer Who Hired Illegal Alien Responsible for Killing 3 in Florida Truck Crash  — The Donald
article_summary: Trump Administration Revokes Business License of Employer Who Hired Illegal Alien Responsible for Deadly Florida Crash - The Trump Administration has revoked the business license of a California trucking company that knowingly hired an illegal alien truck driver who caused a deadly crash in Florida. This action is part of the administration's efforts to crack down on businesses that hire illegal immigrants.</s>
